text: Police response to the stadium fire was incredibly fast and professional.
Stuck in traffic at Patia for 2 hours, where are the police? This is unacceptable.
Officer Kumar was so helpful when my wallet was stolen. Thank you.
The new traffic light system in Saheed Nagar is a complete mess.
Berhampur police's new 'Safe City' initiative is making a real difference.
My complaint about noise in Rourkela was handled very poorly. The officer was rude.
I want to commend the officer who helped my elderly mother at the bank. So kind.
Coastal police in Balasore conducted a successful mock drill.
Why are there no patrols near SCB Medical College? Feeling unsafe at night.
The traffic management during the festival was excellent. Great job by Puri police.
My cybercrime report was handled very efficiently. Officer Patel was a great help.
Another theft in Nayapalli. The police are doing nothing.
Berhampur police just seem to ignore traffic violations. It's chaotic.
Officer Das was a great comfort during our family crisis. We are so grateful.
Police in Koraput seized a large stash of illegal goods. Fantastic work.
The police presence in Infocity is very reassuring. Thank you.
Concerns raised over tourist safety at Puri beach. More patrols needed.
Rourkela police's drive against drunk driving is a great initiative!
I reported illegal fishing and the officer seemed completely uninterested. Very disappointing.
Bhubaneswar-Cuttack Commissionerate Police launched a new app for women's safety.
My call to the helpline was answered immediately. Very impressed.
The response to my stolen bike report was slow and unhelpful.
Sambalpur police's anti-ragging workshop at VSSUT was a big success.
Why does it take 45 minutes for police to arrive for a simple noise complaint?
The officer at the tourist help desk was very professional and spoke English well.
Bhubaneswar police's new traffic plan for Rajpath is working well.
Rourkela Steel Plant security and local police are doing a great job.
Ongoing investigation into counterfeit goods in Cuttack seems to be stalled.
Officer Naik's handling of our local dispute was fair and impartial. Thank you.
Kudos to the officer who helped an injured dog on the street. So compassionate.
Baripada police cracked a major theft case. Excellent investigative work.
The officer at the Angul passport verification office was very rude and uncooperative.
Massive traffic jam on the Bargarh main road. No traffic police in sight.
Jajpur police conducted a successful raid on an illegal distillery.
The beaches in Puri feel much safer now with the new tourist police patrols.
My noise complaint was handled, but it took three follow-up calls. The process is too slow.
Cuttack police's 'Know Your Case' initiative is a great step towards transparency.
Officer was helpful, but the police station in Berhampur was very unclean.
Illegal sand mining is rampant near Balasore. What are the police doing?
Sambalpur police's community outreach in tribal areas is commendable.
Thank you to the officer who found my missing phone in the market. True integrity.
Rourkela police's coordination with plant security is a model for others.
The helpline number for Puri police is always busy. Very frustrating.
Appreciate the quick action on my lost document report.
Bhubaneswar police to increase patrols near IT parks after recent incidents.
The industrial pollution in Angul is a major issue, but complaints go nowhere.
The process for getting a character certificate is now very smooth. Good job.
Police bust major gambling racket in Berhampur.
So much street racing noise in Khandagiri area. Dangerous and loud!
Officer was very respectful and helpful during my passport verification.
New drone surveillance system launched for Puri beach security.
Rourkela police are doing nothing about the open sale of illicit liquor.
I was treated very badly when I went to file a complaint. The officer was biased.
Commissioner's visit to slums in Bhubaneswar builds community confidence.
Bhadrak police's initiative on road safety awareness is a timely move.
My complaint was resolved quickly. I am very satisfied with the service.
Illegal parking everywhere in Bolangir town, but no police to be seen.
Police outreach program in Rayagada's remote areas is a huge success.
The officer who helped with my lost cow was very kind. Thank you.
The police station in Dhenkanal is in a terrible condition. Needs urgent attention.
The beat constable in my area is very active and visible. We feel safe.
Why was the highway blocked for a politician? Total harassment for the public.
Bhawanipatna police arrest notorious criminal gang.
I tried to report a scam, but the officer didn't seem to understand computers.
Very professional and courteous staff at the district police office.
The situation in Rayagada is peaceful, thanks to the police's constant vigilance.
Keonjhar police's quick action saves victims of a major road accident.
I am still waiting for a copy of my FIR. The delay is unacceptable.
Great job by the Commissionerate Police in managing the marathon traffic.
New all-women police station in Berhampur is a welcome step.
The Rourkela police website is broken and out of date.
Drug peddling is happening in broad daylight in Balasore. Shocking!
Cuttack police celebrate 'Police Commemoration Day' with families.
Officer was sleeping at his desk. This is the state of our police.
The traffic police in Bhubaneswar are doing a great job managing the rains.
Nayagarh police's drive against spurious liquor is showing results.
The officer in Koraput was very helpful in resolving my land dispute peacefully.
Roads in Nabarangpur are blocked by protesters. No sign of police.
BSF and Malkangiri police conduct successful joint operation.
I was very impressed by the professionalism of the Boudh police at the check gate.
The police in Deogarh are never on patrol. It feels very unsafe after dark.
Gajapati police's community kitchen during the cyclone was a godsend.
My complaint was marked as 'resolved' but the issue is still there. Very poor service.
The police helpline for Koraput actually works! Got a quick response.
Police intervention in Nabarangpur prevents a child marriage.
The officer was patient and listened to my entire problem. Thank you.
Why do the police in Boudh stop bikers for no reason? Just harassment.
Deogarh police promote local youth to join the force.
I was asked for a bribe at the police station. Disgusted.
New cyber police station in Bhubaneswar is now operational.
The traffic situation near Jagannath Temple is worse than ever.
The officer at the women's help desk was very empathetic and helpful.
Berhampur police's quick action on chain snatchers is appreciated.
Rourkela police needs to be more active. So many open bars.
The officer was polite, but seemed to lack the training to handle my complaint.
Police marathon for 'Run for Unity' in Sambalpur was a great event.
The quick response from the PCR van saved my father's life. I am eternally grateful.
I'm still waiting for my passport verification after 3 weeks. Why the delay?
Angul police's 'Project Surakhya' for miners is a good step.
The highway patrol near Jajpur is non-existent. Very dangerous at night.
I was able to file my complaint online. The new portal is working well.
Mining mafia clashes in Keonjhar. Police presence is ineffective.
Officer was very patient in helping me with the paperwork.
Bhadrak police did a great job managing the festival crowd. No incidents.
Police in Bolangir are cracking down on illegal money lending.
The police helped me find my lost son. I can't thank them enough.
The area around my apartment in Patia is a hub for drug deals. Police are aware but do nothing.
Simlipal forest protection joint task force with police is yielding results.
My complaint was handled very professionally. Thank you Angul police.
The officer I spoke to was very arrogant and unhelpful. A disgrace to the uniform.
Police school outreach program in Bhawanipatna is a big hit with kids.
My stolen goods were recovered! I am so happy with the Keonjhar police's work.
The police station in Rayagada is not accessible for disabled people.
Police bust fake currency racket in Bhadrak.
I was a victim of cyber fraud and the police were very dismissive.
Good to see police patrolling near colleges in Dhenkanal.
Ganjam police's 'Operation Smile' to find missing children is a great success.
The PCR van arrived in 5 minutes. Amazing response time.
So many touts harassing tourists in Puri. The police just watch.
Bali Jatra security arrangements by Cuttack police are top-notch this year.
Nuapada police's campaign against illegal wildlife trade is effective.
I feel the police in Phulbani are biased and only help rich people.
Sonepur police did a great job managing the temple festival crowd.
Police action in Nayagarh on illegal stone quarries is commendable.
Officer was very helpful with my tenant verification process.
The police station in Nabarangpur is always empty. No one to take complaints.
New police outpost in Malkangiri's remote 'Swabhiman Anchal' brings relief.
My application has been pending for weeks. No response from Boudh police.
Kudos to the officer who helped a school bus that broke down.
Gajapati police's partnership with local NGOs is helping tribal youth.
The officer was rude and demanded a bribe for my passport verification.
Police in Kandhamal are doing great work in a tough region.
Sonepur police's quick action solves a robbery case in 24 hours.
The online FIR system is not working. It's a waste of time.
The new traffic rules in Berhampur are being enforced very well. Good job.
Cuttack police's 'Student Police Cadet' program is a great initiative.
I was harassed by touts right in front of the police, and they did nothing.
Finally, some action on illegal parking in Rourkela. Thank you!
Balasore police's 'Pink Auto' service for women is a wonderful step.
My case has been pending for 6 months with no update. Terrible service.
Bhubaneswar police are just busy collecting fines, not managing traffic.
Police presence in Simlipal has reduced poaching. Great work.
The officer was very professional and helped me file my report.
Heavy trucks are destroying the roads in Jajpur. Police need to stop them.
Keonjhar police's 'Aparajita' self-defense training for girls is a success.
I was treated with respect and dignity at the police station.
Why are there no police patrols on the highway at night? It's very dangerous.
My issue was ignored by the local police. I had to complain to the SP.
Police public-mela in Bolangir helps resolve hundreds of small disputes.
Officer was very helpful and guided me on the entire process. 5 stars.
